507740.name: Robotpencil Presents: Improving Your Line Art
507740.description:
This is a tutorial on how to improve your line art.

The topics that covered:
- The purpose of Line art.
- The power of implied line.
- Line thickness importance.
- Overlapping Lines.
- Thick to thin Lines.
- Going in stages depending on skill level.
- Timing yourself to focus on weakness.
507740.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
